price: 23. Il ne saurait être questionné sur Ses œuvres, mais eux seront questionnés sur les leurs.
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
